settings.code: Everything you love about Feetures, now in a shirt.

settings.body_copy:
For over 20 years, our family has been dedicated to designing and making the world’s best performance sock. Over the course of these many years, we have been asked by customers to expand beyond socks.

After years of contemplation, design, and testing, we are adding the Stride Flex Performance Tee. Built on our promise of perfectly fitting performance apparel and our passion for creating products that help you perform your best, we have developed what we believe will be your go-to shirt for all the ways that you move.

- John Gaither, CEO

Introducing the most versatile tee in your wardrobe. Crafted with ultra-soft moisture-wicking fibers, breathable mesh, and anti-odor properties, the Stride Flex performance tee is tailored for performance. Plus, we offer a risk free 30 day money back guarantee!
Talk about odor prevention, hip length (Megan wants a new term we can use like Lululemon's "Race" length), and breathable mesh
Made with high quality technical materials that fuse comfort and performance with durability in mind.

settings.headline: The Perfect Fit
settings.text: Cut at the perfect length for both performance and everyday wear, this tee will be your go-to for all day wear.

settings.headline: Ultra Soft & Breathable
settings.text: This tee is crafted with comfort at the core. Light weight, smooth fabric means you can wear it all day long, and never think twice about it!

settings.headline: Quick Dry, Anti-Odor Fabric
settings.text: Anti-microbial materials make this tee perfect for exercise to errands, without having to stop in between.

settings.headline: Engineered to Last
settings.text: Made with superior quality fabric and durable construction, this tee is built to last.

settings.headline: Created with our advanced technology and innovative features that help you perform your best, the Stride Flex feetures

settings.code:
Money Back Guarantee

We have taken great care in crafting a performance tee with superior fit and feel, and understand the importance of high-quality apparel in inspiring your best performance. That's why we are offering an opportunity for you to try the Stride Flex Performance Tee risk-free. If you are unsatisfied with your tee within 30 days of purchase, we will give you a full refund no matter the amount of wear on the shirt.

settings.text: "Perfect sleeve length and body length and not too oversized but not too slim fitting either. Really the best fitting workout shirt I’ve ever encountered. Great with a variety of bottoms. " - Amy J.
"This is definitely one of my favorite fits on any of my shirts. In fact, I don’t think I have a performance shirt I like better than this." - Rose

"The shirt feels comfortable and form fitting (it resides in that perfect middle ground where it isn’t baggy but also doesn’t feel conflicting or tight). I think the overall length (and sleeve length) is perfect. I could see myself wearing this item not only for exercise but also to run errands. The biggest compliment I can give is that my wife said “that looks good on you, when did you buy that” so I have the ultimate approval." - Raman

"The fit feels a little bit more dialed in than some of the other performance tees. I’ve worn in the past in terms of being tightened in the arms, but no awkward, seems or cuts across the chest abdomen." - Jonathan

"I think the design elements such as the sleeve length and the side panels are extremely flattering and comfortable. I’ve had workout tees that are too bulky or the sleeves are too long, and I don’t like them. I like that this fits my body and gives some shape without making me feel like it’s too tight." - Michelle
